title: this looks like a cool book, if you like Fraktur
content:
I saw this on ebay:  
 [http://cgi.ebay.com/Fraktur-Blackletter-Typography-Published-Last-Month\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002958/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Fraktur-Blackletter-Typography-Published-Last-Month_W0QQitemZ7023427661QQcategoryZ29223QQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem "http://cgi.ebay.com/Fraktur-Blackletter-Typography-Published-Last-Month\_W0QQitemZ7023427661QQcategoryZ29223QQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem")  
I thought some might like, and, no, I have nothing to gain by this auction.

Sincerely,  
Rodrigue Planck
author: Rodrigue Planck

comments.content:
I am sure its a nice book. _( [There even was a thread about it, on Typophile, recently, including that link.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002958/http:/typophile.com/node/18762) :)_ But, If you are really interested in the book, its new and readily available from the publishing house itself, for only 49,80 Euro _( Approx. 61.45 USD, according to xe.com )_, so why should someone pay even more on eBay?

_\> [www.typography.de/verlagsverzeichnis/typografie/696-7.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002958/http:/www.typography.de/verlagsverzeichnis/typografie/696-7.html)_

Dav
